header update only

major refactor of how the source and expected are created. fixed named templates running in the proper context. dtds are now used in all cases to solve problems with entities. only one validation case is created for the source/expected fragments - done by adding the utfx-wrapper element with a content model of ANY to the doctype.
Issue number: 4 Seems to be a bug with the DOM3 serializer. Using DOMWriter to serialize non-element nodes as a workaround.
Issue number: 8 the wrapper stylesheet generated for named templates now calls the templates from a template that matches "utfx-wrapper/*" instead of "/".
Issue number: 7 problem was that the source was always passed through sourceBuilder.getSource() regardless of the use-source-parser attribute. now just use a StreamSource if use-source-parser is "no"
moved third party DTD's under lib
added XSL:FO stylesheet & test for the address book sample
moved third party DTD's under lib; added DTD for XSL:FO
Issue number: 5 The TestSuite had not been created before trying to set the SourceBuilder.

added support for validation; refactoring; work in progress

added transformer factory property; now include samples in the jar
